data.message: Hey Facebook, why did you change how we see comments? I want to see the most recent comments like it used to be, all of a sudden today when I click comments it shows the very first comments with a link to View more comments... This is such a hassle!

replies.message: Hi Jim. You can adjust the comments to 'Recent Activity' in a few easy steps. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1qitVn9 . Let us know if you have any other questions. - Elissa
Or, never being able to see all comments cause you get caught in some kind of "loop" & see same posts over & over.
It didn't work for IPhone!  I don't care about the comments with the most likes keep them in order! It is so annoying! Change isn't always better!!

Agree, this comments change is extremely annoying!  The default should be to see all comments in time order.  No one wants to "adjust" for every post; they want to be able to set their feed to the way they want it.  Why is FB so anti-user friendly?

I agree! Why should we have to go to our settings to adjust anything??? All I want to see when I open up Facebook is the latest comments since the last time I opened it up. Period! Just leave it alone Facebook!!!!!
Why do they always have to screw things up, trying to make it better. Leave things the hell alone.
HI Facebook is their a phone # to call to verify a certificate that i have won regarding Facebook Management Team?
Hi Facebook is their a phone# I can call to reach Facebook Management Team in regards to a certificate I won? Because the Certificate has The CEO of FB on it is this real or fake?
Elissa can you contact the apple folks together their app fixed?  Seems to be quite a problem for iPhone users.
